Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2012 02:54AM SheilaR wrote: Ugh, that stinks, hang in there, Likepink.
Posts.Title: I KNEW hair loss was coming, but.. SheilaR SheilaR

Posts.Content: SheilaR wrote: I am still startled by how rapidly it is coming out EVEN THOUGH I knew it was comiing and had wig one ready. I have had two, just two, AC treaments....and darned if they weren't right when they said week 10 to 14 days it will start coming out. I cut my hair short last weekend - just last weekend. And it is STILL comng out and now I have little bald spots. Heck, I had a new little bald spot this morning. I know that this too shall pass but I swear I thought I would have more time. I'll be Mrs. Clean soon. LOL. Ugh... Dx 6/11/2012, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/7 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I KNEW hair loss was coming, but.. SheilaR SheilaR

Posts.Content: Nov 29, 2012 08:51AM SheilaR wrote: So far, no hair loss on my legs or underarms. But I am losing the hair down their. LOL, not THAT will be interesting.... Thanks for all the kind words, ladies. And thanks, Mod, for the links....
Posts.Title: I KNEW hair loss was coming, but.. SheilaR SheilaR

Posts.Content: Nov 29, 2012 03:40AM SheilaR wrote: I told myself I would just buzz if off because I couldn't handle seeing it fall out in clumps. My hair was already sort of short in an afro (I was going natural, no chemicals) and, sigh, it was just starting to grow before chemo. Double ugh. Anyway, my cutting it last week really short - actaully, my stylist closed the salon and cut it for me - was me doing it in phases. But I realize now that I just need to go ahead and have her buzz it. I will probably go back and buzz it this weekend. I'd rather shave it clean than have little patches.... I am SUPER scared about losing my eyebrows. I just, ugh, I can "hide" my bald head but I cannot hide no eyebrows. I guess I better figure out how to handle that.
Posts.Title: I KNEW hair loss was coming, but.. SheilaR SheilaR

Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2012 09:27PM SheilaR wrote: Hi, all. I started treatment Nov. 8.. Have had two AC teatments so far - two more to go befor 5 of taxol.  My biggest issue with treatment one was, get this, hiccuping a lot and some acid reflux. This last treatment, my doc told me to take Pecid AC twice a day.  I did and it worked. No hiccups and one mild bought of acid reflux. The big thing for me now, and I knew this was coming, is how rapidly my hair is coming out. I thought I was prepared but I guess I was not. I think I will just go ahead and buzz it off this weekend.
